mapper.select: select e.nm_emp as "nm_emp", e.no_emp as "no_emp", to_char(e.enter_date,'YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"') as "enter_date", to_char(e.retire_date,'YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"') as "retire_date", c.nm_cd_emp as "nm_cd_emp", d.nm_dept as "nm_dept", j.nm_jik as "nm_jik", p.email as "email", SUBSTR(p.phone,0,3)||' - '||SUBSTR(p.phone,4,4)||' - '||SUBSTR(p.phone,8,4) as "phone" from ma_emp e, ma_emp_private p, ma_dept d, ma_jikup j, ma_code_emp c where e.no_emp=p.no_emp and e.cd_dept=d.cd_dept and e.cd_jik=j.cd_jik and e.cd_emp=c.cd_emp order by e.no_emp
